text: Mase was a municipality of the district of Hérens in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. On 1 January 2011, the former municipalities of Mase, Nax and Vernamiège were combined to make the new municipality of Mont-Noble.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 19 July 2011 ==References== Category:Former municipalities of Valais
title: Mase, Switzerland
